title: A Man and His Cat
overview: Fuyuki Kanda, a world-famous pianist, has been depressed since his wife passed away. One day, Kanda meets Fukumaru, an unsold cat at a pet shop. Kanda, who is attracted to animals at first sight even though he is not good at animals, reluctantly tells him, "Give me this cat." For Kanda, life with Fukumaru was a series of surprises, but he gradually regains his smile...A heartwarming story about the heartwarming days of a cat who had given up on being loved and a lonely uncle. Even if you can't communicate with each other, it is a work that is sure to heal you at times and bring you to tears at times!
